title: The 60 Best Ernie Els Photos
headline: The 60 Best Ernie Els Photos
description: Celebrate golf's Ernie Els 45th birthday with these 60 photos of the Big Easy throughout his Hall of Fame career, with cameos from Adam Scott, Cindy Crawford and a young Phil Mickelson [above]. Happy Birthday, Ernie!
body: Celebrate golf's Ernie Els 45th birthday with these 60 photos of the Big Easy throughout his Hall of Fame career, with cameos from Adam Scott, Cindy Crawford and a young Phil Mickelson [above]. Happy Birthday, Ernie!
